Articles.Content:
ok, i got the answer, just dont know how to delete a post

Edited October 21, 2018 by FuzzyHead

7 hours ago, FuzzyHead said:

ok, i got the answer, just dont know how to delete a post

You can't, but might I suggest you restore your question and post how you got it answered?  It may help someone else.  If everyone deleted answered questions, there wouldn't be much to this forum, and if you found your answer by stumbling across an old post here... well, that wouldn't have happened!

5 hours ago, Geonovast said:

You can't, but might I suggest you restore your question and post how you got it answered?  It may help someone else.  If everyone deleted answered questions, there wouldn't be much to this forum, and if you found your answer by stumbling across an old post here... well, that wouldn't have happened!

Just going to quote this for emphasis.  Personally, I find it kind of rude to do this.   Like G said, others may have the same question and now they have to go through the process of asking and waiting, while a simple search could have turned it up.   The forums, especially these support forums, are more of a compendium of knowledge, rather than a mere message board.
